mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (name, email, phone, address, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, phone, address, created_at, updated_at FROM customer ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, email, phone, address, created_at, updated_at FROM customer WHERE id = #{id} FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, phone, address, created_at, updated_at FROM customer WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, name, email, phone, address, created_at, updated_at FROM customer
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
AND phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
